original_text: He walked in the way of Asa his father and did not turn aside from it, doing what was right in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 그의 아버지 아사의 길로 행하여 돌이켜 떠나지 아니하고 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: He walked in the way of Asa his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아버지 아사의 길을 걸었고

sentences.original_text: and did not turn aside from it
in the sight of the Lord
